text: Kim Young-ae (; 21 April 1951 â€“ 9 April 2017) was a South Korean actress. She appeared in over sixty movies and 100 television shows. She was best known for her leading role in The Attorney (2013). She was born in Yeongdo District of Busan. Kim died from pancreatic cancer on 9 April 2017 in Seoul. She was 65. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1951 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in South Korea Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean television actors
title: Kim Young-ae
